SoapClient - class edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.dbselection.sampleclient.SoapClient.
This is a test class, to test the dbselection componennt runs under soap This class assumes the soap server is running at:
http://persival.cs.columbia.edu:8181/soap/servlet/rpcrouter
and the dbselection server is named db-selection-server
and the exported method is processInput(String type, String input);
